title: False statement
context: ยง514A-134 False statement. It shall be unlawful for any association of apartment owners, its officers, its board of directors, or its agents to file with the commission any notice, statement, or other document required under this chapter that is false or untrue or contains any material misstatement of fact. Any violation of this section shall constitute a misdemeanor. [L 1989, c 285, pt of ยง1; am L 2009, c 129, pt of ยง9]
